page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PAULA
page.content: I get up at 7.40 and get dressed. Then I have my breakfast.At 8.30 I cycle to school, and after registration we go to assembly. My first lesson was combined science,which was followed by my break,when I chat to my friends.Next was maths, which was followed by French.In the afternoon I made cakes, in our cookery lesson.After school, I plonked myself in front of the tele for about three quarters of an hour. When I got up, I started my homework. At 5.30 my mum arrived home from work, and started tea.I set the table, and we usually have something like chips and meat, with a vegetable.I then carried on with my homework, and later watched tele, sometimes I listen to my Wham! records.At about 10.00, I get ready for bed, and read until I fall asleep at about 10.20.{PAULA RHODES,13
